author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter DITRA HEAT Peel and Stick mat tips…I primed the plywood with Schluter PRIMER PS and 1/4 inch nap roller. That cured within an hour. Then I bonded the Peel and Stick mats to the subfloor and activated the pressure-sensitive adhesive with a wood floor. Both the heat cable and tile can be installed over the mats on the same day. Many thanks to Schluter for sponsoring this project and providing materials for my client’s bathroom 🔥#ditraheat #bathroomremodel #homeremodel #schlutersystems #homerepairtutor #brandpartner
title: Schluter DITRA HEAT Peel and Stick Mat Tips - #shorts #schlutersystems #brandpartner
